elements.name: Login and go to product page

steps.name: The user is on login page and then fills login form with folowing information
The user clicks on login button
Login should be successful and user is on profile page

elements.name: Verify that Checkout is working with correct credentials

steps.name: The user click on add to cart button of first item
The user fills personal information form with following information
The user should direct to the checkout overview page and should see following information
The user click on  finish button
